title: Aural set, choral folk song - scale identification

content.description: You will hear a folk song consisting of a brief introduction, three verses, and a codetta. The introduction and first verse will be played twice; then the entire song will be played twice. Before hearing the introduction and first verse for the first time, please read the questions.
content.question: The song employs a mixture of major and what other scale or mode?

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Use symbols and terms to describe features of pitch in performed music, including pitch patterns and relationships, melodic features, chords, harmonic progressions, and cadences.
